messages.author: markusheintz_
messages.text: You only call this method inside the 'PermissionActionToUIString' method. I think you could get rid of this method by moving the code of the method body to 'PermissionActionToUIString'

messages.author: markusheintz_
messages.text:
I think we don't need this method anymore. Let's just inline the "return ..."
part and move the method 'PermissionValueToUIString' from the anonymous namespace over here. same below.
